annotations.description: Sother Teague is the genius behind the fantastic bar Amor y Amargo (@creativedrunk on instagram) and this wonderful cocktail. But it bears mentioning that th...
annotations.title: Breakfast Bell - Hair Of The Dog By Sother Teague!

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Bourbon
1oz (30ml) Heavy Cream
1oz (30ml) Cold Brew Coffee
1.5tsp Maple Syrup
1 Egg White
Top 3oz (90ml) Soda Water

Dry shake all but the soda water really well
Shake with ice
Pour into collins and top with soda water
Add Siracha and pepper to egg yolk as prairie oyster

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-WAh-BG7Ttk
title: Breakfast Bell
